fields.name: link_id
fields.description: Primary key â€“ could be SharedStreets Reference ID

fields.name: dir_flag
fields.description: Optional. 1 = flow follows direction of shapepoints in the Link_Geometry (forward); -1 = flow is against shapepoint direction (backward);  0 = Unspecified.

fields.name: parent_link_id
fields.description: Optional. Associated link. For example, if this link is a sidewalk, a parent_link_id could represent the roadway it is along.

fields.name: lanes
fields.description: Number of lanes in the direction of travel

fields.name: bike_facility
fields.description: Type of bicycle accommodation: unknown, none, WCL, sharrow, bikelane, cycletrack, offstreet path

fields.name: ped_facility
fields.description: Type of pedestrian accommodation: unknown, none, shoulder, sidewalk, offstreet path

fields.name: parking
fields.description: Type of parking: unknown, none, parallel, angle, other

fields.name: allowed_uses
fields.description: Set of allowed uses: SHOULDER, PARKING, WALK, ALL, BIKE, AUTO, HOV2, HOV3, TRUCK, BUS, etc. e.g. [AUTO,BIKE]
